gamblermod:LuckyCoin.NAME: Lucky Coin
gamblermod:LuckyCoin.DESCRIPTION: Increase or Decrease the cost of a card in your hand by !M! for the rest of the fight (Min. 0). NL Exhaust.
gamblermod:LuckyCoin.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Increase or Decrease the cost of a card in your hand by !M! for the rest of the fight (Min. 0).

gamblermod:HighCard.NAME: High Card !D!
gamblermod:HighCard.DESCRIPTION: Deal highest card value as damage. (Currently !D! damage.) NL Exhaust. NL Ethereal.
gamblermod:HighCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal highest card value + 2 as damage. (Currently !D! damage.) NL Exhaust. NL Ethereal.

gamblermod:ClubPair.NAME: Pair of Clubs
gamblermod:ClubPair.DESCRIPTION: Deal pair value + 1 damage. (Currently !D! damage.) NL Exhaust. NL Ethereal.
gamblermod:ClubPair.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal pair value + 3 damage. (Currently !D! damage.) NL Exhaust. NL Ethereal.

gamblermod:DiamondPair.NAME: Pair of Diamonds
gamblermod:DiamondPair.DESCRIPTION: Gain pair value as Block. (Currently !B! Block.) NL Exhaust. NL Ethereal.
gamblermod:DiamondPair.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain pair value + 2 as Block. (Currently !B! Block.) NL Exhaust. NL Ethereal.

gamblermod:SpadePair.NAME: Pair of Spades
gamblermod:SpadePair.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust 1 status or curse. NL Exhaust. NL Ethereal.
gamblermod:SpadePair.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust 2 statuses or curses. NL Exhaust. NL Ethereal.

gamblermod:AceClubs.NAME: Ace of Clubs
gamblermod:AceClubs.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each attack in your hand.

gamblermod:AceDiamonds.NAME: Ace of Diamonds
gamblermod:AceDiamonds.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for each skill in your hand.

gamblermod:AceHearts.NAME: Ace of Hearts
gamblermod:AceHearts.DESCRIPTION: For each power in your hand at the start of your turn, draw 1 additional card.
gamblermod:AceHearts.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: For each power in your hand at the start of your turn, draw 1 additional card. NL Innate.

gamblermod:TenClubs.NAME: Ten of Clubs
gamblermod:TenClubs.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies for each attack in your hand.

gamblermod:TenDiamonds.NAME: Ten of Diamonds
gamblermod:TenDiamonds.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! gold for every other skill in your hand. NL Exhaust.
